paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a new TTR variant associated with amyloid polyneuropathy in two German-American families.

patients.demographics: German-American, ages in sixth decade of life
patients.phenotype: systemic amyloidosis with carpal tunnel syndrome and peripheral neuropathy

individual_records.phenotype_details: carpal tunnel syndrome followed by peripheral neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Affected subjects presented with carpal tunnel syndrome in the sixth decade of life followed by peripheral neuropathy.

individual_records.phenotype_details: carpal tunnel syndrome followed by peripheral neuropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Affected subjects presented with carpal tunnel syndrome in the sixth decade of life followed by peripheral neuropathy.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a point mutation leading to a substitution in the TTR protein.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the families.
variants.additional_notes: The variant is newly identified and associated with systemic amyloidosis.
key_quotes: We report studies on two German-American persons with systemic amyloidosis.
Affected subjects presented with carpal tunnel syndrome in the sixth decade of life followed by peripheral neuropathy.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
